text: (ai rasool) tumase log sharaab aur jue ke baare mein poochhate hain to tum un se kah do ki in dono mein bada gunaah hai aur kuchh phaayade bhee hain aur un ke phaayade se un ka gunaah badh ke hai aur tum se log poochhate hain ki khuda kee raah mein kya kharch kare tum unase kah do ki jo tumhaare zarurat se bache yoon khuda apane ehakaam tum se saaf saaf bayaan karata hai
